name: Continuing Mission
description: The Federation's flagship has pursued its continuing mission throughout the temporal anomaly crisis, but the appearance of an older iteration suggests the danger that mission represents. Can you untangle the temporal web binding the Enterprise-C?
rules:
-- In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Fascination Lwaxana Troi, any version of Dak'Rah, Ulis, Yar, Ferengi, or crew with matching Battle Traits, will provide a bonus.
-- Using the U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-C, the U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701-D, or the Defiant-Class Ship will provide a bonus to hull.
-- Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Fascination Lwaxana Troi, Dak'Rah, Ulis, Yar, or Ferengi

featured_crew.name: Maab
featured_crew.flavor: While playing to both the Klingons and Federation in the mining negotiations, Maab assassinated the current Teer and seized power.

action.name: I Begin To Like You, Earthman...

featured_crew.name: Ulis
featured_crew.flavor: Captain of the Ferengi pirates who infiltrated the USS Enterprise to plunder it. However, the piratesâ€™ greed would be their downfall.

featured_crew.name: Yar
featured_crew.flavor: Refugee of an alternate universe in which the Enterprise-C fought daily battles against the Klingon Empire.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Yar
rewards.flavor: Security Chief of the U.S.S. Enterprise-D. Later killed in action by an alien lifeform.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

ship.name: Defiant-Class Ship
ship.flavor: Named after the initial prototype, brought into production during the Dominion War to serve as warships.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Maab
rewards.flavor: While playing to both the Klingons and Federation in the mining negotiations, Maab assassinated the current Teer and seized power.

action.name: I Begin To Like You, Earthman...

rewards.name: Yar
rewards.flavor: Refugee of an alternate universe in which the Enterprise-C fought daily battles against the Klingon Empire.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.
